trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Goose Creek
There were no other sightings in Goose Creek on or around October 30th 2008
divs: Sighting Detailson Oct 30 2008 in the vivacity of the city of Goose Creek, Berkeley County area of South Carolina. i seen 5 lights over the tree line about 10pm. the lights were in a pentagon shape blinking from red then green then white, the pentagon shape of the light were 5 times bigger then airplane landing lights, Don Blair 1. i was in my back yard 2. the size and blinking of on and off 3. thats way to big to be a plan 4. pentagon shape woving every slowly 5. wow this will be my 2nd time i have seen a UFO. 1st time was Edwards airforce 1965. 6. it moved over the tree line, don't know how anybody could have missed seeing the lights. 7. no pic.
